connect20/web4pro_abandonedcart.name: connect20/web4pro_Abandonedcart

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/web4pro_abandonedcart.description:
Recover abandoned cart. Send reminder via email. 
Encourage customer to come back and place an order.

connect20/web4pro_abandonedcart.name: connect20/web4pro_Abandonedcart

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/web4pro_abandonedcart.name: connect20/web4pro_Abandonedcart

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/web4pro_abandonedcart.description:
Extension allow customer to place a fast order in one single click based on
customer provided phone number and/or email.
Additional notes can be added to fast order by customer
Customer can enable checkbox to make order only with current product 
or cart content and current product.
